title: Phenomenon Catalog
description: Catalogs unusual phenomena in the world: magical storms, dimensional rifts, time anomalies, cursed zones, natural wonders, and other extraordinary occurrences.

fixed.description: Whether the phenomenon occurs at a fixed location or moves

effect.description: What the phenomenon does to the environment, creatures, or travelers

cause.description: Known or theorized cause (natural, magical, divine, unknown)

known_by.description: Who knows about this phenomenon: common knowledge, scholars, local tribes, etc.

benefits.description: Any positive effects or opportunities the phenomenon provides

related_phenomena.description: Other phenomena that may be connected -- seemingly unrelated phenomena can share a hidden origin

controllable.description: Whether the phenomenon can be controlled, activated, or deactivated -- and by whom

compels_approach.description: Whether the phenomenon draws people toward it

x-cross-references.supernatural-prevalence: Related to the world's supernatural level
x-cross-references.magic-system-overview: May be caused by the magic system
